Subject: Invitation to Guest on "Tech Starter" – Episode on Beginner Coding

Hi Dr. Rao,

I’m Alex Rivera, host of the "Tech Starter" podcast, where we help listeners take their first steps into the world of technology. Our recent episodes on Python basics and no‑code automation have resonated strongly with our audience – 30% of them are actively looking for beginner‑friendly programming guidance.

Given your acclaimed "Programming Foundations" course and its impact on over a quarter‑million learners, I believe you’d be a perfect guest for our upcoming episode titled "Getting Started with Code: Foundations for Beginners." We’d love to discuss your approach to teaching coding fundamentals, any tips you have for absolute beginners, and how newcomers can continue their learning journey after the episode.

The interview typically lasts 30‑40 minutes and can be recorded at a time that suits you. Please let me know if you’d be interested, and we can work out the details.

Thank you for considering it – I’m excited about the possibility of sharing your expertise with our community!

Best regards,
Alex Rivera
Host, Tech Starter Podcast
alex@techstarterpod.com
